definition: mental arithmetic/to calculate in one's head/planning/preparation
to regard as/to figure/to calculate/to compute

sentences.english: But Carroll was the first person to devise an algorithm suitable for mental calculation.
sentences.chinese: 但是卡羅爾的算法確實第一個適合心算的。

sentences.english: Conclusion The abacus mental calculation training could progress the children's basis cognitive ability.
sentences.chinese: 結論珠心算訓練對兒童的認知能力有一定影響。

sentences.english: But it can also improve the brain's ability to do mental arithmetic.
sentences.chinese: 它還能改善大腦做心算的能力。

sentences.english: Mathematics anxiety effect is related to problem-size effect.
sentences.chinese: 數學焦慮對心算的影響與問題大小效應關係密切。

sentences.english: Do you feel like it is getting more difficult to focus your attention, or calculate numbers in your head?
sentences.chinese: 你是否感到越來越難集中注意力，或者難以進行心算？

sentences.english: What if he did not know how he might be interested in it abacus ?
sentences.chinese: 如果他什麼也不知道，他怎麼可能對珠心算有興趣呢？

sentences.english: For him, doing mental calculations was a form of play.
sentences.chinese: 對於他來說，做心算就如遊戲一樣有趣。

sentences.english: How long has the mental calculation with abacus been promoted in this kindergarten?
sentences.chinese: 珠心算在我們這個幼兒園已經開展多久了？

sentences.english: He can do easy sums in his head but has to write out hard ones.
sentences.chinese: 他能心算簡易的算術題，但難題要用筆算。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the influence of abacus mental calculation training on children cognition ability.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察珠心算訓練對兒童認知能力的影響。

sentences.english: I wasparticularly good at mental arithmetic.
you also learn how to add and subtract in your head.
sentences.chinese: 你也應該學會加減法的心算。

sentences.english: My fondness for mental arithmetic came in very handy.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡心算因爲使用心算是很方便的。

sentences.english: Want to calculate crazy math problems in your head?
sentences.chinese: 你想心算那些瘋狂的數學題嗎？

sentences.english: That's what jacks are for. I can't add long columns of figures in my head.
sentences.chinese: 我不能心算一長串數字的加法，那是計算器做的事情。

sentences.english: He can do easy sums in his bead but has to write out hard ones.
sentences.chinese: 他能心算簡易的算術題，但難題要用筆算。

definition: to do a sum in writing/written calculation
four rules of arithmetic/addition, subtraction, multiplication and division
(math.) the ratio of the circumference of a circle to its diameter (π)
to do two things at once (idiom)/to multitask/to divide one's attention
